resources.string: To allow user to view the details of the artist, album and podcasts and the audios with them.
To allow user to listen to a short snippet of song and/or purchase songs.
To allow user to look for artists, albums and podcasts on the app.
To allow user to play/stream audio file.
Make requests to get the list of songs associated with the artist, album and podcast.
Require a networking library to connect to the server to retrieve a list of available songs and apis to stream snippets of songs and/or purchase songs.
Require data storage to store all the information where the system can run queries to filter results from the storage.
Require an audio player and for streaming, a network library to stream audio file.
